subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: In the face of serial second-guessing over his decision to tinker with the swing that won him 3 majors, Padraig Harrington has maintained both his sense of humor and his equilibrium.
snippet: In the face of serial second-guessing over his decision to tinker with the swing that won him 3 majors, Padraig Harrington has maintained both his sense of humor and his equilibrium.
